title: The Bonfire Live 3 Year Anniversary at Skankfest NYC 2018 in Brooklyn, New York
description: This week's Best of the Bonfire catches us celebrating a milestone live from Skankfest in Brooklyn. It was a packed crowd as Big Jay and Dan rejoice with Campers over 3 Years of the Bonfire. Then, it's back to business and Jay reveals that he recently had an "accident" in the show and learned that he narrowly avoided a "waffle stomp."
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Comedy Central)
